title: Why does my Pixel 4 XL become dysfunctional and hot after a system update?
content:
After any update, my Pixel 4 XL will get really hot and be unable to cool down for several hours.

As well, Messages app stops functioning properly- delayed launch times when opening the app (sometimes not working at all), it's unable to connect to the Messages for web and messages will stop sending.

Any clue how to fix this?
